title: Check Out the September 2023 Art Corner
content: Look at this month's roundup of our favorite fan art!

title: Important Changes to Expired Item Pickup
content: Learn about upcoming changes to the Expired Pickup pet skill.

title: [Updated Sept. 22 #2] Cash Shop Update for September 20
content: Royal Styles, Dark Musician Package, Change Royal Styles, and more!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Minor Patch - September 21, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 5 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: v.244 Hotfixes - September 15, 2023
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.244 Punch King Palooza update.

title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - September 14, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 6 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.
